title: raamaa raamaa raamaa
sahitya:
rAma rAma rAma lAli shrI rAma rAma rAma lAvaNya rAma

anupallavi

 dorakarAni nidhi rArA doraku doravu nIvu toTalalO rArA

caraNam 1

 varamainaTTi nA paTTi rArA varasurulaku aruDaina sundara rArA
   
caraNam 2

 toli jEsina nOmu phalamA rAma ilanu velayu mA inakula dhanamA
   
caraNam 3

 kalakalamani rAvu centa Akali koNTivO lEka karuNAsvAnta
   
caraNam 4

 mada gaja gamana nA svAmi O sadayuDa nIlOni jAli delpumi
   
caraNam 5

 saribAlu lADa rammaniri Adi varada nIvu ravvadu pommaniri
   
caraNam 6

 evaru ninnu Emaniri rAghava nIyeDa tappukani rAvaddaniri
   
caraNam 7

 kanulu mUsi ADinAru karamuna kaNagani nEtramani kasaredaru
   
caraNam 8

 kaluva rEkulanu bOlu kanulu kalaganela nannu kanna dayALO
   
caraNam 9

 tETa kannulanu musEdaru nA tOTi vAralella pO vaddanEdaru
 
caraNam 10

 nutuDanu shrama jAlamEla A kAthayEmi delupavE karuNAlavAla
 
caraNam 11

 cintacE dAgudu vErE mEni kAnticE tagilitE karma manEre
 
caraNam 12

 mutyAla sarula cikkEmi O satyasandha pAdasarula nokkEmi
 
caraNam 13

 mudamuna nE paTTu vELa nA padamuna vrAledaru palumA rEvELa
 
caraNam 14

 ninnEmani bilcukOniri rAma mannanatO Emani encukOniri
 
caraNam 15

 bAga sAkSi rammaniri vara tyAgarAjanuta deivamA yaniri
